title: A North Dakota medical waste facility says a human torso was delivered to its site and is suing
description: Human remains delivered to a North Dakota medical waste facility are part of tangled litigation involving a regional health care system and the disposal company

title: Former sheriff who nabbed 'Green River Killer' to run for Washington governor
description: A former sheriff and congressman known for his work that led to the capture of the “Green River Killer” has entered the race to become Washington’s next governor

title: Congressional Republicans offer their own student loan debt solution

title: String of DC explosions believed to be isolated incident, possibly vandals: Sources

title: Churchill Downs extends trainer Bob Baffert's ban through 2024
description: Baffert initially was suspended after his 2021 Derby winner failed a drug test.

description: At least seven people on a Hawaiian Airlines flight from Honolulu to Sydney were injured when the plane hit severe turbulence last week

description: Her wish on her 100th birthday will warm your heart.

title: Reward offered in search for suspects in Baltimore block party mass shooting

description: Several immigrant rights organizations plan to challenge the law in court.

title: WATCH:  Venue employee dances at Taylor Swift concert as crowd cheers him on

title: 6 dead, 1 critically hurt at house fire; murder investigation underway
description: A murder investigation is underway after six people were found dead at the scene of a house fire in Colleton County, South Carolina, on Sunday, authorities said.

title: Legacy college admissions under scrutiny following SCOTUS ruling
description: College admissions preferences, including those for university donors or alumni relatives, have come under scrutiny following the Supreme Court ruling.

title: US ambassador visits Wall Street Journal reporter detained in Russia
description: The US embassy says its ambassador to Russia was allowed to visit Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gerhkovich, who has been behind bars in Russia since March on charges of espionage

description: Robert De Niro is mourning the death of his "beloved" grandson Leandro Anthony De Niro-Rodriguez.

title: Police officer and man are killed as Indiana hospital confrontation leads to gunfire
description: Shots were fired after officers confronted a man at a Tell City Ind., hospital.

title: Hiker falls to his death in front of wife and 5 children on Oregon nature trail
description: A hiker was killed over the weekend when he slipped and plummeted down the side of a mountain in front of his wife and five children in Oregon, officials said.

title: Michigan man accused of striking an officer during the US Capitol attack is arrested in Florida
description: A Michigan man is accused of attacking a police officer with a flagpole.

title: Black bear bites homeowner and attacks his dog; both are recovering

title: China's defense minister and Russia's navy chief meet for military talks

title: Hong Kong police offer rewards for arrests of 8 overseas pro-democracy activists
description: Hong Kong police have accused eight self-exiled pro-democracy activists of violating the territory’s harsh National Security Law and offered rewards of $127,600 each for information leading to their arrests

title: Prize-winning Ukrainian writer dies of injuries suffered from missile attack
description: The PEN America rights group says award-winning Ukrainian writer Victoria Amelina has died from her injuries suffered after a Russian missile attack on a popular restaurant last week

description: Cliff divers take to the air as they compete in the sport's World Series in beautiful Italy.

title: US recommends Americans reconsider traveling to China due to exit bans
description: The U.S. is recommending Americans reconsider traveling to China because of arbitrary law enforcement, exit bans and the risk of wrongful detentions

title: An explosion in a downtown Tokyo building has injured four people, according to media reports

title: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen is making a long-awaited trip to China this week
description: Janet Yellen will travel to Beijing in an effort to thaw U.S.-China relations.
